Trade/Device Name(s): Immunalysis Quantisal II Oral Fluid Collection Device
Quantisal II Oral Fluid Collection Device
Regulation Name(s): Oral Fluid Drugs Of Abuse And Alcohol Test Specimen Collection Device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immunalysis Quantisal II Oral Fluid Collection Device for collection, preservation, and transport of oral fluid specimens for drug testing
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the collection, preservation, and transport of oral fluid specimens for tetrahydrocannabinol (THC), benzoylecgonine, cocaine, morphine, codeine, oxycodone, hydrocodone, 6-acetylmorphine, phencyclidine, amphetamine, methamphetamine, buprenorphine, methadone, benzodiazepines, and tramadol; prescription use only.
